course.title: Tutorial-Senior Year
course.faculty_text: Nicholas Watson and members of the Department
course.description: Supervised individual tutorial in an independent scholarly or critical subject.
course.prerequisites: Satisfactory completion of one term of English 98r, completion of an undergraduate seminar (90-level) taken in the junior year or earlier, and faculty approval of proposed thesis topic.
course.notes: Two terms required of all thesis honors seniors. To enroll, students must submit for approval a Thesis Proposal.
